attributes.action: A General Election should take place If a serving Prime Minister resigns.
attributes.additional_details:
I think the law should be replaced , that if a serving Prime Minister , resigns or defeated in a Leadership Contest by his own MP's; 
Then whoever is the New Prime Minister should have to call a General Election within 6 months of becoming Prime Minister.

This law should apply to all parties.
Conservatives, Labour, Liberal Democrats , Green Party etc
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to debate this in the House of Commons.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603334
